auto_discovery_mode.description: Automatically discover and process files from resources directory
notes: Program will automatically find all .txt and .md files in resources/
Will process maximum 10 files (or all files if less than 10)
Files are sorted alphabetically by name
No need to specify individual file paths

manual_mode.description: Manually specify which files to process
notes: Must specify exact file paths in 'files' array
Useful when you want to process specific files only
Can include files from different directories
Must ensure all specified files exist

limited_processing.description: Process only a few files for testing or limited resources
notes: Will process only first 2 files found in resources/
Useful for testing with small datasets
Reduces processing time and memory usage
Increased thread pool for parallel processing
Higher file size limit for large documents

required_fields.name: Application name - MUST be present and non-empty

optional_fields.max_responses: Max search results per query (default: 5, min: 1)

common_issues.no_files_found: Check if resources_directory exists and contains supported files
common_issues.files_not_loading: Verify file paths are correct and files are readable
common_issues.too_many_files: Reduce max_files_to_process or use manual mode
